structure.unit: SOVEREIGNTY AND JURISDICTION OF THE COMMONWEALTH

text.section: May 7 of each year is named and declared to be "Barrier Awareness Day" throughout the Commonwealth.
August 2 of each year is named and declared to be "Disability Day" throughout the Commonwealth.

law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 1, effective May 7, 1988. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984.
